name: Answers sent for review (after edit)
body:
Dear ((first name)) ((last name))

Your updated application has been sent to your ((partner)) to review at ((their email address)). They need to review by ((date of response)). 

You will receive a notification confirming if they agree with the information. If they do not review it, then you will be told what you can do to progress the application. 

Divorce and Dissolution
HM Courts & Tribunals Service
divorcecase@justice.gov.uk
0300 303 0642 (Monday to Friday, 8am to 6pm)

Your feedback helps improve this service for others: https://www.smartsurvey.co.uk/s/Divorce_Feedback/?pageurl=/email
subject: Your updated ((isDivorce??divorce application))((isDissolution??application to end your civil partnership)) has been sent for review
